articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Sends Notice to Unification Ministry of S. Korea
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Sends Notice to Unification Ministry of S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) sent a notice to the Ministry of Unification of south Korea Thursday via Panmunjom.
					 The notice recalled that all Koreans and public at home and abroad are becoming more vocal calling for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, greeting the New Year, pointing out that the same situation as what happened last year should not be allowed to repeat itself.
					
					 The notice said: 
					
					 Prompted by this purpose, we clarified an important principled stand on improving the relations between the north and the south on the occasion of the New Year and showed our will in practice. 
					
					 The south side, however, behaved from the outset of the New Year quite contrary to our sincere efforts; media, experts and even authorities were indiscreet in their speeches and behaviors. It staged war drills firing bullets and shells. 
					
					 What was worse, the south side at a New Year press conference argued even our internal matter pro and con, blaming us. 
					
					 As regards the principled questions raised by us, it gave incoherent answers to them under the pretext of the nuclear issue. 
					
					 The notice said with great regret that there is no fundamental change in the south side's present stance of confrontation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The south side proposed arranging a reunion of separated families and relatives on the occasion of the Lunar New Year. This is a good offer if it was prompted by its sincere good will to alleviate the pain resulting from division and improve the inter-Korean relations.  
					
					 By origin, the issue of arranging the reunion of separated families and relatives was proposed by the DPRK and reached almost the phase of implementation last year but it was not realized due to the south Korean authorities' improper attitude and hostile acts. Now we are glad that the south side proposed it.
					
					 But in south Korea, one war drill is being followed by another saber-rattling and huge joint military exercises are slated soon, the notice said, querying can the separated families and relatives have reunions in peace amid gunfire.
					
					 Moreover, the Lunar New Year's Day should be taken into consideration in the light of the season and timing, the notice said, adding if there is no other thing happening in the south side and if the south side has intent to discuss the proposals of our side, too, both sides can sit together in a good season.
					
					 The notice expressed the stand of our side to make efforts for the improvement of the north-south relations in the future, too.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Working People's Organizations Meet
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Working People's Organizations Meet
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) and officials and members of the  Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) held meetings respectively on Thursday to carry through the important tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the GFTUK and the DWUK and other officials concerned, workers and union members.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that his historic New Year Address serves as the banner instilling the conviction of the bright future of Songun Korea and revolutionary self-esteem into the Korean people and important guidelines indicting the shortcut to new leap forward and innovations.
					
					 They called for strengthening material and labor assistance to the agricultural sector, setting up many good structures representing the Songun era and diligently learning modern science and technology.
					
					 They said that the metallurgical and chemical industries, twin buttresses of an economic giant, should supply sufficient amounts of steel and various kinds of chemical goods that are needed to reenergize the national economy as a whole and improve the people's standard of living. 
					
					 The electric-power and coal-mining industries and the rail transport sector should make coordinated innovations and thus give strong impetus to the development of the national economy and the light industrial factories should step up modernization and introduction of CNC technology into their production lines and put production on a normal footing, they noted.
					
					 They voiced their determination to make a big stride in the construction of culture to contribute to building the highly civilized socialist nation, intensify the assistance to the People's Army and consolidate the country's defence capabilities.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Vow to Carry Out Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Vow to Carry Out Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies in Kangwon Province and Nampho City Thursday vowed to thoroughly carry out the important tasks laid out by Marshal Kim Jong Un in the New Year Address.
					 The rallies were attended by officials of the provincial and city party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, factories, enterprises, farms and universities and other people including youth and students.
					
					 At the rally in Kangwon Province the reporter and speakers called for actively introducing scientific farming method and doing all farm work as required by the Juche farming method and thus reap a rich harvest on all co-op farm fields in the province this year.
					
					 They stressed the need to push forward the construction of major projects including stock-breeding base in Sepho tableland, Kosan fruit farm and Wonsan Army-People Power Station and thus turn city and counties into a socialist land of bliss. 
					
					 They also called for learning from the example set by those in the fisheries of the Korean People's Army to modernize fishing vessels and tackles and conduct active fishing and offshore culture in a big way.
					
					 They vowed to establish the traits of attaching importance to the military affairs and arms, actively aid the army, consolidate the great army-people unity in every way.
					
					The reporter and speakers at Nampho City mass rally called on the Chollima Steel Complex, Taean Heavy Machine Complex and Kangso Knitwear Factory and other factories and enterprises to increase production and accelerate construction by relying on locally available raw materials and fuel and ultra-modern science and technology.
					
					 They underlined the need to uphold Kim Jong Un's New Year Address and turn Nampho city into a modern port city and give a face-lift to streets, neighborhoods and worksites.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Gripping Audience
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Gripping Audience
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- All of the numbers put on the stage at the Schoolchildren's New Year performance now under way here have enjoyed acclamation from the audience.
					 Among them is a folk instrumental trio "My Country Is Best".
					
					 The performers play flute, Janggu (a kind of drum) and kayagum, in combination with rhythmic dance movements.
					
					 Their artistic skills are so amazing that it is hard to believe they are at the age of about 10.
					
					 In rhythmic gymnastics "Songdowon Children's Camp, Cradle of Happiness" the performers in sporting uniforms, each with a life belt in hands, displayed excellent movements.  
					
					 An acrobatics "Roller-skate Is So Good" is also one of those numbers provoking admiration of the audience.

articles.title: Production Upsurge to Be Effected in Light Industry
articles.content:
Production Upsurge to Be Effected in Light Industry
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Light industry plays a major part in improving the people's standard of living in the DPRK. 
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address underscored the need for the light industry factories to step up their modernization and introduction of CNC technology into their production lines and increase the proportion of locally-available raw and other materials, in order to put production on a normal footing. 
					
					 Upon receiving his New Year Address, important guidelines to make a new leap forward in production, the officials and workers in the field of light industry are fully determined to produce more goods of high quality this year.
					
					 Last year, they built or technologically updated a number of light industrial establishments including the Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory and Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory, thus further consolidating the material and technical foundations for improving the people's standard of living, true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea that defined light industry as a major thrust in the nation's economy.  
					
					 Through the movement for developing new goods and the campaign for increased production, many factories overfulfilled their yearly assignments on all indices.
					
					 They have also pushed ahead with the work to increase the ratio of localization in production.
					
					 Textile machine factories have succeeded in making different kinds of spare parts for flexible rapier looms, while the shoe-making industrial sector in developing vinyl chloride elastomer.
					
					 Last year, Kim Jong Un attended the national meeting of light industrial workers to lay a new milestone for developing light industry and made field guidance to the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and different foodstuff factories to inspire them to effect a new surge and innovations in production.
					
					 All the successes achieved last year convinced the light industrial workers that this year they can bring about a epoch-making change in improving the people's standard of living if they carry out the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons' Movement for Becoming Crack Shots
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons' Movement for Becoming Crack Shots
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, in his New Year Address set forth tasks to further develop the KPA into the powerful revolutionary army of Paektusan that is unfailingly faithful to the Workers' Party of Korea, the leader, the country and the people.
					 In the address, he stressed that the servicepersons should intensify combat training and launch a brisk movement for becoming crack shots so as to prepare themselves to be a-match-for-a-hundred combatants with excellent marksmanship, strong physique and a high sense of discipline.
					
					 After initiating the movement for becoming crack shot, Kim Jong Un wisely led the work to fully display its vitality last year.
					
					 Guiding the shooting contest of the participants in the 4th meeting of the company commanders and political instructors of the KPA, he said servicepersons cannot satisfactorily fulfill their combat duties when they are not good at shooting even if they are prepared well politico-ideologically and physically.
					
					 It was in March last year that he guided landing and anti-landing drills of KPA units. 
					
					 He called the women artillery soldiers, who had been involved in the artillery firing at the landing enemies, to come close to him. He personally designated a firepower position beside him and set a target without any notice before giving an order to destroy it.
					
					 When they hit the target, he encouraged them to launch a dynamic movement for becoming one-beats-a-hundred crack shots at ordinary times to be artillery heroes.
					
					 When guiding a drill of a KPA unit, he initiated the commanding officers of the unit in the knack of marksmanship after inspecting their pistol and automatic rifle shooting event.
					
					 He stressed that it is most important for soldiers to become crack shots.
					
					 Now all the KPA servicepersons are making strenuous efforts to become crack shots by conducting more intensive combat and political training, true to the intention of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- It is 20 years after President Kim Il Sung left his last autograph on a historic document concerning Korea's reunification, which reads: Kim Il Sung on July 7, 1994.
					 This autograph tells how he had worked heart and soul for national reunification.
					
					 In his lifetime the President had always cared much about the national reunification issue. He took the issue into consideration even when drawing up any state policy and guiding economic and external affairs.
					
					 In the period from June 20 to July 5, 1994, the last year of his great life, he gave scores of instructions on national reunification. And on July 7, a day before his demise, he examined a reunification-related document to be dealt at forthcoming inter-Korean summit and put his last signature on it.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the lodestar of national reunification and father of the Korean nation who devoted all his life to accomplishing the cause of the country's reunification.
					
					 So, the document carrying his last autograph has been preserved as a national treasure for all ages and a monument inscribed with his signature was erected at Panmunjom to convey to posterity his great feats for national reunification.

articles.title: Prerequisite to Improved Inter-Korean Relations: News Analysis
articles.content:
Prerequisite to Improved Inter-Korean Relations: News Analysis
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, set forth important guidelines for national reunification in his New Year Address, which evokes lively response among all Koreans and world progressives.
					 Even south Korean media gave prominence to the address under such headlines as "First Chairman Kim Jong Un Expresses Stand to Improve Inter-Korean Relations in Vocal New Year Address", "Improved Inter-Korean Relations Highly Possible".
					
					 People across the world are unanimous in highly praising Kim Jong Un for his steadfast will to put an end to the history of distrust and confrontation and open up a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address underscored the need to establish a favorable climate for improved relations between the north and the south, in order to make a fresh progress in the national reunification movement this year. 
					
					 What should be settled ahead of others is to stop slinging mud at and showing hostility to each other. 
					
					 Slandering each other, which stems from feelings of hostility and distrust, will only escalate confrontation and antagonism between the north and the south, not helpful towards the bilateral ties.
					
					 The Korean nation boasts of long history and glorious culture. Therefore, it is intolerable to see the Korean people antagonizing each other until now.
					
					 It is a unanimous desire and aspiration of the Korean nation that the north and the south should no longer be engaged in a cycle of confrontation and disputes. 
					
					 The July 4 joint statement and the north-south joint declarations adopted between the north and the south require both sides to stop slandering and restrain themselves from those acts of getting on the other's nerves.
					
					 In the June 15 era of reunification, the north and the south had promoted the national reconciliation and unity and positively developed the inter-Korean relations to rejoice the entire Korean nation.
					
					 It will be an important step for improving the north-south relations at risk and resuming dialogues and negotiations between them to stop slandering each other and getting on the other's nerves. And it will be a show of the firm will for improved north-south relations at present.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should turn out in the nationwide struggle for the improved north-south relations, so as to open up a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Reveals Danger of Imperialist Ideological and Cultural Poisoning
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Reveals Danger of Imperialist Ideological and Cultural Poisoning 
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- To thoroughly check the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning is a very important issue for consolidating the political and ideological position of the revolution, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 Upset by the people's intensified struggle for independence, the imperialist reactionary forces are attaching greater significance to the ideological and cultural poisoning and leaving no means untried to put it into practice, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 What the imperialists are seeking in their ideological and cultural poisoning is to spread bourgeois idea and capitalist life-style to other countries. 
					
					 The imperialists' idea and culture are based on an extreme selfishness which turns people into animal-like beings who would do anything to meet their own interests. Herein lies the danger of the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning.
					
					 The imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning is a vicious reactionary offensive to undermine the faith of people in socialism.
					
					 If people harbor any illusion about capitalism, they will abandon their faith and be left ideologically disarmed.
					
					 The imperialists put efforts to spreading bourgeois idea and culture as they believe that this will prove effective with least efforts.
					
					 If one falls short of clearly understanding the essence and danger of the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning and fails to be vigilant against it, one will meet an irrevocably serious consequence.
					
					 The historical lesson proves that with the imperialists trying hard to spread the reactionary bourgeois idea and culture to the socialist countries, it becomes necessary to thoroughly check it and strengthen the work to arm all the members of society with the revolutionary idea.

articles.title: U.S. Plans to Increase Aggression Forces in Forefront Area of S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Plans to Increase Aggression Forces in Forefront Area of S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression forces are mulling introducing into south Korea their motorized battalion armed with the updated tanks and armored cars and others under the pretext of deploying forces on a rotating basis.
					 The battalion was withdrawn to the U.S. mainland from Iraq. It will be reportedly introduced into south Korea and deployed in the northern part of Kyonggi Province to belong to the 1st Brigade of the 2nd Division of the U.S. forces.
					
					 In this regard, south Korean media said that the U.S. forces are contemplating increasing armed forces in the area along the Military Demarcation Line and deploying new weapons there.
					
					 The U.S. is massively introducing war hardware and forces in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinities, bringing dark clouds of a war for aggression.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Distortion of History to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Distortion of History to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore in an editorial on Jan. 6 decried the puppet regime's moves to distort history geared to reviving the "yusin" dictatorship.
					 History textbooks eulogizing sycophancy and dictatorship were rejected by schools across south Korea, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 The present regime is responsible for this but it has not yet made an apology.
					
					 Moreover, Park Geun Hye in a New Year press conference said the existing textbooks carry prejudiced ideological content.
					
					 In June last year when the majority of students polled described the June 25 Korean war as a "war of aggression on the north", Park said the education is misguided and that it is undesirable to see facts and history being distorted.
					
					 Park's distortion of history got into full swing since then with a design to give a high profile to Park Chung-Hee.
					
					 It is important not to cater for the tastes of the chief executive and the ruling quarters in writing history textbooks.

articles.title: Falsity of Plotted Rebellion Case Exposed
articles.content:
Falsity of Plotted Rebellion Case Exposed 
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People carried an editorial titled "There was no plot of rebellion" on Wednesday.
					 The latest trial opened to the public a recorded lecture which was allegedly given in May last year. It was described as a key proof of the plotted rebellion by the Unified Progressive Party, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 The prosecutor bluffed before playing back the recorded lecture that the data will prove the verdict of guilty but the results gave the lie to all the data the authorities raised to charge the party with plotting a rebellion.
					
					 Listening to the recorded lecture, those who attended the trial and reporters found out with not much difficulty several incoherent spots.
					
					 Commenting on this, the Intelligence Service and the prosecution argued that those were not intentional mistakes but in fact, the mistaken part was not just a few words.
					
					 As for the atmosphere of the place where the lecture was given, laughing voices of people and crying voices of children could be heard there, a place apparently unsuitable for plotting a rebellion. 
					
					 The recorded data, called the key proof of the case, was ascertained to be a fake, proving the non-existence of such case as the plotted rebellion.
					
					 The editorial expressed hope that those detained on false charges will be set free at an early date.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Calls for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Calls for Korea's Reunification 
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The representative of the Internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S. Minjok Thongsin made public an appeal on Jan. 1, calling for the unity of all Koreans to bring earlier the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					 The appeal said:
					
					 Korea is one and it is essential to end foreign interference and domination to settle the reunification issue.
					
					 The outsiders are to blame for the division of the Korean nation and all the pains the Koreans have suffered for nearly seven decades.
					
					 Now is the time for the Koreans to end the nation's partition and get ready for the immensely eternal future of the nation by their concerted efforts.
					
					 Coming nearer is the day when the country will be reunified in line with the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 All Koreans except pro-U.S. sycophantic forces should come out in the effort for national independence and reunification and under the uplifted banner of the Korean nation-first spirit. They should involve politicians, workers, peasants, youth, students and conscientious intellectuals and businessmen. 
					
					 Korea can surely be reunified if all Koreans in the north and south and abroad pool their efforts.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans' Organizations Call for Ushering in New Phase of Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans' Organizations Call for Ushering in New Phase of Independent Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany issued a joint statement on Jan. 7 in support of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The statement noted:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address said that all the Koreans should achieve solid unity under the truly patriotic banner, the principle of By our nation itself, turn out in the nation-wide struggle for the country's reunification and thus open up a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year.
					
					 His address serves as a beacon for the Koreans, who have experienced the pain resulting from the division, as it indicates a clear orientation and ways to accelerate the country's reunification.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is, however, challenging the positive and magnanimous proposal for defusing tension on the Korean Peninsula, improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving peaceful reunification.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad are full of enthusiasm to turn out in the movement for the country's reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, firmly believing in him only. 
					
					 Let's reject foreign forces, the cancer-like presence barring national reunification, and firmly hold fast to the standpoint of By our nation itself.
					
					 All the Koreans should actively turn out in their struggle to protect the nation's security and peace, regarding them as the most precious.
					
					 All the Koreans should make dynamic efforts for establishing a favorable climate for the improved relations between the north and the south, regardless of their past.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Question of the National United Front" was posted by the Switzerland-Korea Committee on its website on Dec. 28 last year.
					 The work, made public on Dec. 22, Juche 34 (1945), refers to the nature of the Korean revolution, historical experience of the united front movement, immediate duties of the Korean revolution and the national united front.
					
					 It also clarifies the principle to be maintained in forming the national united front and the idea of its mission in Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Sons and Daughters of Revolutionary Martyrs Should Become the Reliable Backbone of the Songun Revolution Who Would Stoutly Carry Forward the Lineage of Mangyongdae, the Lineage of Paektu" was brought out in pamphlet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 25 last year.
					 His letter, made public on Oct. 12, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School are schools of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and centers for training the backbone of the Songun revolution as they were built and developed under the care of the great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It also clarifies the responsibilities and duties of the revolutionary schools.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Reported by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Reported by Foreign Media
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign media reported supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address from Jan. 1 to 4.
					 Liaoning Daily and Heilongjiang Daily of China reported Kim Jong Un's New Year Address illustrated with photos of him making the address and going round the Masikryong Ski Resort. Similar reports were also posted on websites of China.
					
					 The papers and websites reported in detail that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address reviewed the victories and achievements made last year and set forth tasks facing the Workers' Party of Korea and the army and people of the DPRK this year.
					
					 The Ugandan paper Sun Rise and the DR Congo paper La Prosperite carried the full text of his New Year Address accompanied with a photo of him making the address.
					
					 Media of many other countries reported the gist of his New Year Address illustrated with photos documenting his revolutionary activities.
					
					 They included the Lao National TV, Kuwaiti papers Al Watan and Kuwait Times, Myanmar papers Union Daily and Seven Day Daily, Iranian Central TV, Press TV and websites, Mongolian paper Odriin Sonin and an internet news, Thai paper Bangkok Post, Cambodian paper Phnom Penh Post, Indonesian News and TVs, Indian paper Times of India, Qatar News, Austria Presse-Agentur (APA) and Austrian ORFTV and leading papers, South African paper Pretoria News and TV and the Australian papers Sydney Morning Herald and The Australia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Austrian, Ethiopian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Austrian, Ethiopian Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- Austrian and Ethiopian organizations released statements on Jan. 2 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna of Austria said they received Kim Jong Un's New Year Address with keen interest.
					
					 It goes to the credit of invincible Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism that the Korean people made great achievements last year, the group noted, and went on:
					
					 The goals set forth in the address imply the far-sighted wisdom of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The Korean people will successfully attain the goals under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said the tasks Kim Jong Un set forth in his address serve as a fundamental way for accelerating the construction of a thriving nation and ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We are confident that only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people in their endeavors to build a thriving nation and achieve the national reunification independently and peacefully under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the group concluded.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Praised by British Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, January 9 (KCNA) -- The New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un is a great programme for socialist construction and a revolutionary work.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association noted this in their joint statement on Jan. 1.
					
					 Kim Jong Un set "Let us raise a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward on all fronts of building a thriving country filled with confidence in victory!" as a slogan to be upheld by the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people this year and indicated the tasks for carrying it out, the statement noted.
					
					 Saying this year significantly marks the 50th anniversary of the Theses on Socialist Rural Question published by President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Un in the New Year Address called for dynamically conducting ideological, technological and cultural revolutions in rural areas, bringing about a radical turn in agricultural production and thus fully proving the validity and vitality of the theses, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Un said the most important state affair is to bolster up the defence capabilities and the dignity of the country, the happiness of the people and peace rest on strong arms. He underscored the need to continue to strengthening the defence capabilities of the country.
					
					 We fully support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address and will actively disseminate it.

articles.title: CRPP envia aviso al Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP envia aviso al Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) envio el dia 9 por via de Phanmunjom un aviso al Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea.
					  Con motivo del Ano Nuevo, crecen las voces de nacionales y extranjeros en demanda del mejoramiento de las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, comienza la notificacion y prosigue:
					
					  Con el proposito de impedir que se repitan las feas circunstancias dadas en el ano pasado, expusimos con motivo del Ano Nuevo la importante posicion de principios sobre el mejoramiento de relaciones N-S y demostramos la voluntad practica a ese efecto.
					
					  En contrasentido a los esfuerzos sinceros de nuestra parte, los medios de prensa, los especialistas y hasta las autoridades de la parte surcoreana pronunciaron discursos groseros desde el principio de este ano y libraron los ejercicios de guerra tirando bombas y balas.
					
					  En la rueda de prensa del Ano Nuevo, la parte Sur cuestiono los asuntos internos de nuestra parte y con el enajenado tema nuclear respondio a los problemas de principios que hemos formulado.
					
					  Lamentamos mucho que la parte Sur no haya cambiado en lo fundamental su anterior postura conflictiva.
					
					  Consideramos positiva la propuesta surcoreana de preparar el encuentro de familiares y parientes, que viven separados en ambas partes, con motivo del Ano Nuevo Lunar, si esa hubiera partido de la buena fe de restar los dolores de division y mejorar las relaciones N-S.
					
					  El encuentro de ese tipo estuvo a punto de celebrarse el ano pasado por la iniciativa de nuestra parte, pero quedo frustrado debido a la actitud indecente y actos hostiles de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					  Menos mal que ellas hayan propuesto celebrarlo ahora.
					
					  Pero, prosiguen en suelo surcoreano los ejercicios de guerra y comenzara pronto una maniobra militar conjunta de gran envergadura.
					
					  ?Sera posible que los familiares y parientes separados se reunan tranquilos en medio de tiroteos?
					
					  Pensamos que el primero de enero lunar debe ser considerado tanto en lo estacional como en el tiempo.
					
					Si no pasa nada desagradable en la parte Sur y esta tiene la voluntad de debatir nuestra iniciativa tambien, podremos sentarnos a conversar en una estacion apacible.
					
					Al final, el aviso reitero la posicion de la RPDC de esforzarse por mejorar las relaciones con el Sur de Corea.

articles.title: Entidades de masas expresan apoyo al mensaje de Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Entidades de masas expresan apoyo al mensaje de Ano Nuevo
						
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 9 los mitines de obreros y gremiales de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea y de funcionarias y miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea para materializar las tareas importantes indicadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					En los actos participaron el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Yong Su, los funcionarios de la FGSC y la UMDC y de las ramas interesadas, los obreros y gremiales de ambas entidades.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el historico mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal es la bandera estimulante y guia programatica que infunde al pueblo coreano la conviccion en el futuro radiante y la dignidad revolucionaria e ilumina el atajo para lograr nuevos saltos e innovaciones. 
					
					Expusieron la decision de aumentar el apoyo material y laboral a la rama de agricultura, levantar mucho mas edificios arquitectonicos que representen la epoca del Songun y aprender las ciencias y tecnicas modernas. 
					
					Insistieron en que la industria metalurgica y la quimica, que son pilares gemelos de la potencia economica, deben activar la economia nacional en su conjunto y producir y suministrar suficientemente los materiales de hierro y varios productos quimicos necesarios al mejoramiento de las condiciones de vida del pueblo. 
					
					Enfatizaron que las industrias de electricidad, carbon y transporte ferroviario lograran innovaciones coordinadas con el objetivo de impulsar el progreso economico del pais, mientras que las fabricas de industria ligera aceleraran la modernizacion y la aplicacion de la tecnologia de CNC y normalizaran la produccion. 
					
					Subrayaron la necesidad de dar grandes pasos adelante en la cultura para contribuir realmente a la construccion del Estado socialista civilizado, intensificar la ayuda al ejercito popular y consolidar la capacidad de defensa nacional.

articles.title: Mitines de apoyo a mensaje de Ano Nuevo En Kangwon y Nampho
articles.content:
Mitines de apoyo a mensaje de Ano Nuevo En Kangwon y Nampho
						
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 9 en la provincia de Kangwon y la ciudad de Nampho los mitines multudinarios para materializar las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, el Poder y economia, las entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades de respectivas localidades junto con los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					En el mitin efectuado en la provincia de Kangwon, los oradores destacaron que al introducir los cientificos metodos de cultivo y realizar todas las faenas agricolas segun la demanda del autoctono metodo agricola se debe lograr abundantes cosechas en las granjas cooperativas de la provincia de Kangwon, donde se dio inicio al arreglo de tierra.
					
					Apuntaron la necesidad de acelerar con vigor la construccion de importantes objetos incluyendo la base ganadora de la zona de Sepho, la Granja Fruticola de Kosan y la Central Hidroelectrica "Ejercito y Pueblo" de Wonsan y acondicionar magnificamente como paraiso socialista todas las ciudades y distritos.
					
					Debemos modernizar los barcos y equipos pesqueros, desplegar activamente la captura de peces y realizar en gran escala la acuicultura maritima al aprender del ejemplo mostrado por la rama pesquera del Ejercito Popular de Corea, acotaron.
					
					Anadieron que deben establecer estrictamente el ambiente de dar prioridad a asuntos militares y a las fuerzas armadas, apoyar el EPC e intensificar por todos los medios la gran unidad entre los uniformados y civiles.
					
					En el acto efectuado en la ciudad de Nampho, los oradores puntualizaron que el Complejo de Acero Chollima, el Complejo de Maquinaria Pesada de Taean, la Fabrica de Generos de Punto de Kangso y otras fabricas y empresas deben acelerar la produccion y la construccion, apoyandose en las materias primas, combustibles y ultimos logros cientificos nacionales.
					
					En acato al mensaje del ano nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, hay que acondicionar Nampho como ciudad cultural portuaria y  renovar la fisonomia de calles, aldeas y lugares de trabajo, finalizaron.

articles.title: Trabajadores de industria ligera deciden producir muchos articulos de consumo popular
articles.content:
Trabajadores de industria ligera deciden producir muchos articulos de consumo popular
						
Pyongyang, 9 de enero (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la industria ligera juega un papel muy importante en el mejoramiento de niveles de la vida del pueblo.
					En su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un subrayo que a las fabricas de esta rama les corresponde acelerar con entusiasmo la modernizacion y la aplicacion de la tecnologia de CNC y lograr la estabilidad productiva al elevar la proporcion de uso de materias primas y materiales nacionales.
					
					Informados del mensaje, los funcionarios y obreros de la rama deciden producir este ano mucho mas articulos de consumo de buena calidad.
					
					Acorde al proposito del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que el ano pasado, habia fijado la industria ligera como sector de prioridad, ellos modernizaron la Fabrica de Condimentos de Pyongyang y mejoraron el proceso de produccion de varias fabricas, inclusive la Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong, lo cual contribuyo a consolidar la base material y tecnica para el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.
					
					En el fragor de la emulacion por el desarrollo de nuevos productos y el aumento de produccion, muchas fabricas sobrecumplieron el plan de economia nacional y el de produccion por indices.
					
					En las fabricas de industria ligera se activo la campana de uso de materias primas y materiales nacionales.
					
					Tales exitos se deben a la sabia direccion del Mariscal quien indico nuevo jalon de desarrollo en la Conferencia Nacional de Industria Ligera e incentivo el auge de produccion visitando la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang y las alimentarias.
					
					Estimulados por notables exitos del ano expirado, los funcionarios y trabajadores del dominio redoblan la seguridad de que este ano tambien pueden producir un cambio trascendental en la mejora de la vida del pueblo si trabajan segun las instrucciones del Mariscal.
